General.Name: Fantasia Holdings Group Co. Limited
General.Description: Fantasia Holdings Group Co., Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the property development business in the People's Republic of China. It operates through six segments: Property Development, Property Investment, Property Agency Services, Property Operation Services, Hotel Operation, and Others. The company is involved in the development and sale of urban complexes and residences; leasing of investment properties; provision of property operations, hotel accommodation services, property project management and other services. It also provides engineering services and sells fuel pumps. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. Fantasia Holdings Group Co., Limited operates as a subsidiary of Fantasy Pearl International Limited.
